com.orchestranetworks.service
Class ActionPermission

java.lang.Object
  com.orchestranetworks.service.ActionPermission

public final class ActionPermission
extends Object

Defines the permissions for whether or not a user can execute an action.

The possible states are:

  • hidden – the action is not displayed to the user;
  • disabled – the action is displayed to the user, but it cannot be executed. An option message can be displayed as to why the action is disabled;
  • enabled – the action is displayed and can be executed;
